TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ModifierKeysConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 將 物件來回轉換成其他型別。

span.span: Converts a object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來回轉換做為分隔符號使用"+"字元。The converts to and from a using the "+" character as the delimiter. 例如，字串`Control+ALT`會轉換成物件，內含和索引鍵。For example, the string `Control+ALT` would be converted into a object consisting of the and keys. 此行為不同於預設 XAML 剖析器層級的列舉型別結合字元"，"。This behavior differs from the default XAML parser-level enumeration combine character of ",".
